message.content:
```python
def palindrome_of_length_at_least_n(text):
    import re
    text = text.lower()
    text = re.sub('[^a-z]', '', text)
    n = 91
    palindromes = set()

    for i in range(len(text)):
        for j in range(i + n, len(text) + 1):
            substring = text[i:j]
            if substring == substring[::-1]:
                palindromes.add(substring)
    return palindromes
```
